Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI will likely dive deeper into analysing every single word written in an assignment and providing feedback on that, whereas a teacher has greater understanding and knowledge of the topic and can provide more specific ideas and points.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Not that I can think of.
